resources.string: -Click on Add Plot in the menu to add a plot\n-Press on a plot to view its plants/info\n-Long press on a plot to edit its shape

-The plot that is being edited has wider stroke
-To change its color, click on Change color in the menu, click the desired color, then click the middle circle to confirm
-Click on Drag mode then drag the edited plot to the desired position
-Click on Rotate mode and then drag the cursor in the bar below to change its rotation
-Click on Save to save the changes and go back to the garden screen
